PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 In addition , interchain - charge transfer should be facilitated by intermolecular Se°°°Se contacts , most likely leading to a widen absorption band and enhanced mobility that are desirable for high photocurrents.

Let's think step by step.

```diff
| Property Value |
| --- |
| interchain-charge transfer |
| intermolecular Se°°°Se contacts |
| a wide absorption band |
| enhanced mobility |
| high photocurrents |
```

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

```diff
| Property Value |
| --- |
| enhanced mobility |
```
The other entities in the original paragraph do not clearly refer to the value of a material property. "Interchain-charge transfer" and "intermolecular Se°°°Se contacts" are physical phenomena, not material properties. "A wide absorption band" is a property of a spectrum, not a material. "High photocurrents" is a desirable outcome, not a material property.
